charges.charge_description: Indictment filed 1/7/04: 21:841(a)(1) Distribution of 5 grams or more of cocaine base(2-4)

charges.charge_disposition: Plea of guilty to Counts 2-4. Imprisonment for 188 months as to each count, to all run concurrently. Senence shall run concurrently with state sentence deft is presently serving. Remanded to custody. Five years supervised release as to each count, to all run concurrently, with special conditions 1-5. $300 special assessment.

charges.charge_description: Indictment filed 1/7/04: 21:841(a)(1) and 18:2 Aiding and Abetting the distribution of 5 grams or more of cocaine base(1)
Superseding Felony Information filed 12/30/04: 21:843(b) and 18:2 Use of communication facility to distribute and to possess with intent to distribute cocaine base(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Plea of guilty to Count One of the superseding information. Imprisonment for 15 months. Remanded to custody. One year supervised release, with special conditions. $100 special assessment.

charges.charge_description: Indictment filed 1/7/04: 21:841(a)(1) and 18:2 Aiding and Abetting the distribution of 5 grams or more of cocaine base(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Count One of the underlying indictment dismissed on motion by Govt.
